summary:
I'm a Chilean 🇨🇱 entrepreneur living in the Netherlands, a lifelong traveller and a cycling enthusiast.

In 2013 I founded Teamscope, a data collection software for clinical research. In September 2022 Teamscope was acquired by StudyPages.

After selling Teamscope I decided to focus entirely on product design and created Product Alchemy (https://www.productalchemy.co), a one-man design agency for SaaS companies.

My design services include:
- Web and mobile design
- Webflow development
- UX research
- Rapid prototypes

When I'm not working, I'm most likely on my bike. That's where I find my essence and easily remind myself that life is amazing.

Need a UX/UI designer? I'm available! 👋
